Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Capital City in 1975...
Injured on 4/8/1976 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/14/1977 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/28/1977 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 8/26/1977...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/18/1980 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 4/16/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $1,588,000 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1983, going 1-0, 0.79...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/1/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
